InfoScreen.Name: sbsodinfo
InfoScreen.Text: Santa Barbara Sense-of-direction scale You will be shown 15 questions regarding your spatial and navigational abilities. Please answer them as truthful as possible.

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sbsod_p1
ChoiceQuestion.Text: This questionnaire consists of several statements about your spatial and navigational abilities, preferences, and experiences. After each statement, you should circle a number to indicate your level of agreement with the statement. Circle "1" if you strongly agree that the statement applies to you, "7" if you strongly disagree, or some number in between if your agreement is intermediate. Circle "4" if you neither agree nor disagree."1+ to 3"

Label.Text: 1. I am very good at giving directions.
2. I have a poor memory for where I left things.
3. I am very good at judging distances.
4. My "sense of direction" is very good.
5. I tend to think of my environment in terms of cardinal directions (N, S, E, W).
